jobDescription: Grade Potential is seeking knowlegeable, reliable, enthusiastic, and inspirational tutors for all subjects and ages!  Even though this posting says "San Jose", we serve the entire SF Bay Area from Gilroy through Marin County, so all South Bay, Peninsula, SF/Marin, and East Bay  We generally pay between $20-$40 per hour depending on experience and location etc.  We can potenially offer you as many or as little hours/clients as you'd like. Some of our tutors work just a few hours per week, and some work nearly full time.  Apply now, thank you!  math tutor, reading tutor, teacher, private tutor, english tutor, spanish tutor, french tutor, chemistry tutor, phyics tutor, biology tutor and all others!
